suggest.doctrine/orm: Store version using an ORM entity / Take normalized snapshots of ORM entities (requires symfony/serializer)
suggest.symfony/console: Commands to manipulate versions / Initialize versioning context using command event (requires symfony/event-dispatcher)
suggest.symfony/event-dispatcher: Initialize versioning context using an event listener
suggest.symfony/http-kernel: Initialize versioning context using http event (requires symfony/event-dispatcher)
suggest.symfony/security: Initialize versioning author using token storage (requires symfony/http & symfony/event-dispatcher)
suggest.symfony/serializer: Take snapshot of domain models using normalization
